mapper.select: /* USE : CmmMenuMapper.getStoreCdList */ SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_MS_STORE WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}

/* USE : CmmMenuMapper.getHqInfo */ SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, HQ_OFFICE_NM, OWNER_NM FROM TB_HQ_OFFICE WHERE SYS_STAT_FG != '9'
AND SYS_OPEN_DATE < SYSDATE AND SYS_CLOSURE_DATE > SYSDATE
AND HQ_OFFICE_CD LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeCd}||'%'
AND HQ_OFFICE_NM LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeNm}||'%'
ORDER BY REG_DT, MOD_DT DESC
mapper.insert: /* USE : CmmMenuMapper.insertMenuHist */ INSERT INTO TB_WB_MENU_USE_HIST ( SEQ, USER_ID, RESRCE_CD, USE_DATE, USE_DT, LOGIN_IP, V_USER_ID ) VALUES ( SQ_WB_MENU_HIST.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{resrceCd}, #{useDate}, #{useDt}, #{loginIp}, #{vUserId} )
mapper.select: /* USE : CmmMenuMapper.getBkmkMenuList */ SELECT twri.P_RESRCE, twri.RESRCE_CD, twri.RESRCE_NM, twri.URL, tcn.NMCODE_ITEM_2 AS ICON_NM, FN_GET_MENU_CHK_YN(#{userId}, twri.RESRCE_CD) AS CHK_YN FROM TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO twri INNER JOIN ( SELECT twri.RESRCE_CD FROM TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO twri START WITH twri.RESRCE_CD IN ( SELECT twri.RESRCE_CD FROM TB_WB_BKMK twb LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO twri ON twb.RESRCE_CD = twri.RESRCE_CD WHERE twb.USER_ID = #{userId} AND twb.USE_YN = 'Y' ) AND twri.RESRCE_FG = 'M' AND twri.USE_YN = 'Y' CONNECT BY twri.RESRCE_CD = PRIOR twri.P_RESRCE GROUP BY twri.RESRCE_CD ) auth ON twri.RESRCE_CD = auth.RESRCE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM_NMCODE tcn ON tcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '056' AND twri.RESRCE_CD = tcn.NMCODE_ITEM_1 START WITH twri.P_RESRCE = '000000' AND twri.RESRCE_FG = 'M' AND twri.USE_YN = 'Y' CONNECT BY PRIOR twri.RESRCE_CD = twri.P_RESRCE ORDER SIBLINGS BY twri.DISP_IDX ASC, twri.FUNC_FG ASC
